QuestData.Title: WANTED: Ayame
QuestData.Description:
Wanted: For the death of twelve pilgrims and their escort to Torga's Rest. A reward is offered to anyone who brings in the head of the great serpent, Ayame.
-Korkush
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Known to prey upon the unwary near Torga's Rest.
QuestData.LogDescription: Hunt down Ayame and obtain its head.
